data.name: XRWorkout
data.description:
Sprint. Squat. Jump. Crunch.

XRWorkout is the FULL-BODY FITNESS app of the future.

üñêÔ∏èCONTROLLERLESS
üí™HIGH INTENSITY
üëìMIXED REALITY
üßë‚Äçü§ù‚ÄçüßëMULTIPLAYER

‚ñ∂Ô∏èExperience complete freedom of movement with a totally controllerless, hands-free experience, bringing you the most comprehensive and effective workout in virtual reality.

‚ñ∂Ô∏èGrab your chair and use your wall for your exercises in our new Jungle Gym update.

‚ñ∂Ô∏èMove at your own pace, with intelligent exercise design that meets you where you‚Äôre at, and safely pushes you to the limit.

‚ñ∂Ô∏èChoose from eight immersive environments, from the heights of a glowing city skyline to the depths of a luminous cave.

‚ñ∂Ô∏èOr use our state of the art mixed reality mode, with the full clarity of your immediate surroundings to support you.

‚ñ∂Ô∏èMeet up with friends across the globe with our multiplayer experience, where you can challenge each other in competitive motion through a custom workout of your own design.

‚ñ∂Ô∏èLevel up with our live classes, where you can push yourself in a group setting with managed by your workout host

Happy. Healthy. Social. Global. We do this together. üëä

We Are Movement.

changelog.change_log: Fixes performance issues if the Microphone permission is not granted
